languages.text: "Почему ты считаешь, что бунтовщики скрываются среди мирного населения? У них могут быть другие убежища".
"Why do you think the rebels are hiding among the civilians? They could have shelters elsewhere."
languages.original_text: "Почему ты считаешь, что бунтовщики скрываются среди мирного населения? У них могут быть другие убежища".

traits.locale_text: "Why do you think the rebels are hiding among the citizens? They could have shelters elsewhere."
"Why do you think the rebels are hiding among the citizens? They could have shelters elsewhere."
"Why do you think the rebels are hiding among the citizens? They could have shelters elsewhere."
"Why do you think the rebels are hiding among the citizens? They could have shelters elsewhere."
"Why do you think the rebels are hiding among the civilians? They could have shelters elsewhere."
"Why do you think the rebels are hiding among the civilians? They could have shelters elsewhere."

languages.text: "Warum denkt Ihr, dass sich die Rebellen unter den Zivilisten verstecken? Sie könnten doch überall sein."
languages.original_text: "Why do you think the rebels are hiding among the civilians? They could have shelters elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: "Warum denkt Ihr, dass sich die Rebellen unter den Zivilisten verstecken? Sie könnten doch überall sein."

languages.text: « Pourquoi pensez-vous que les rebelles se cachent parmi les civils ? Ils pourraient avoir des refuges ailleurs. »
languages.original_text: "Why do you think the rebels are hiding among the civilians? They could have shelters elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi pensez-vous que les rebelles se cachent parmi les civils ? Ils pourraient avoir des refuges ailleurs. »

languages.text: «¿Por qué cree que los rebeldes se ocultan entre los civiles? Podrían tener refugios en otra parte».
languages.original_text: "Why do you think the rebels are hiding among the civilians? They could have shelters elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué cree que los rebeldes se ocultan entre los civiles? Podrían tener refugios en otra parte».

languages.text: “你为什么觉得叛乱分子会混迹在平民之中？他们可能在很多地方都有避难所。”
languages.original_text: "Why do you think the rebels are hiding among the civilians? They could have shelters elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: “你为什么觉得叛乱分子会混迹在平民之中？他们可能在很多地方都有避难所。”

languages.text: 「反乱軍が民間人の中に潜んでいるのは、なぜだと思う？彼らは他にも拠点を持っているかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "Why do you think the rebels are hiding among the civilians? They could have shelters elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: 「反乱軍が民間人の中に潜んでいるのは、なぜだと思う？彼らは他にも拠点を持っているかもしれない」

languages.text: "İsyancıların neden siviller arasında saklandığını düşünüyorsun? Başka sığınakları da olabilir."
languages.original_text: "Why do you think the rebels are hiding among the civilians? They could have shelters elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: "İsyancıların neden siviller arasında saklandığını düşünüyorsun? Başka sığınakları da olabilir."
